title: Users cannot create challenges after the Postseason has ended
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND the 2013 Postseason has completed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the "Create New Challenge" button 
OR taps on the "+" button in any of the "Challenges" tabs
custom_expected:
THEN the following dialog message should appear:
> Alert Header: Thanks for playing!
> Alert Text: The 2014 MLB season has ended. Please check back for an updated version of the Head to Head Challenge application prior to the start of the 2015 season.
>Alert Button: Close
